column1: Imagine SWITZERLAND (WHO - World Health Organization headquarters) doing a COVID-19 human social experiment between children under 10 and elderly “grandparents” promoting hugging BEFORE finding a cure or releasing Coronavirus vaccine Well we’ll have to pray, wait & see. Insane
